entities.description: Occurrence of arguments or problems with family or friends due to alcohol use.
Increased risk of physical harm due to alcohol use.
Symptom involving sweating or feeling that one's heart was beating fast during alcohol withdrawal.
Symptom involving hands trembling during alcohol withdrawal.

relationships.description: Relates alcohol use disorder to arguments or problems with family or friends.
Indicates that alcohol use disorder increases the risk of physical harm.
Indicates that sweating or feeling that one's heart was beating fast is a symptom of alcohol withdrawal.
Indicates that hands trembling is a symptom of alcohol withdrawal.

triplets.subject: AlcoholUseDisorder
triplets.object: arguments or problems with family or friends

triplets.subject: AlcoholWithdrawal
triplets.object: sweating or feeling heart beating fast
